channel.title: CVE Feed for Check Point -- Check Point Endpoint Security Client for Windows, VPN blade
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Check Point -- Check Point Endpoint Security Client for Windows, VPN blade

item.title: CVE-2019-8459|2024-08-04T21:17:31.581Z -- check%20point -- check%20point%20endpoint%20security%20client%20for%20windows%2C%20vpn%20blade
item.description: Check Point Endpoint Security Client for Windows, with the VPN blade, before version E80.83, starts a process without using quotes in the path. This can cause loading of a previously placed executable with a name similar to the parts of the path, instead of the intended one.
